text: hello beautiful saturday everyone, I have a question where do I create a script that adds the required value to validate a mandatory field, but HubSpot does not take it, do you know if something has changed with HubSpot or any alternative that you give me? Thanks for the help

And you can also just console.log the jquery version to double check:
```<https://api.jquery.com/jquery-2/>```
This is one of my favorite blogs for this: <https://www.depositfix.com/blog/how-to-display-custom-error-message-in-HubSpot-form>
